serialNumber.description: Serial number of the StoreOnce appliance the store belongs to

cloudStoreId.description: The cloudStoreId of the cloud store

name.description: The name of the cloud store

description.description: The description of the cloud store

encryptionEnabled.description: True if cloud store is encryptionEnabled

cloudDiskBytes.description: The amount of capacity used (post dedupe) in the cloud

localDiskBytes.description: The amount of capacity used (post dedupe) on the appliance

userBytes.description: The amount of data stored in the cloud

sparseIndexBytes.description: Size of the sparse index in bytes

version.description: The protocol version for the store

lastAccessedDate.description: Date/time the cloud store was last accessed by a StoreOnce appliance

createdDate.description: Date/time the cloud store was first created

attached.description: True if cloud store is currently attached

markedForDeletion.description: True if store is marked for deletion

recoverSerialNumber.description: Serial number of the StoreOnce appliance currently connecting to the cloud store, blank if no connect in process.

recoverStartDate.description: Date/time the current connect process was started, blank if no connect in processs.

status.description: Numerical value representing the status of the store.

statusString.description: Localised string representation of the status of the store.

recoverEligibilityStatus.description: Numeric value representing if the store can be connected to in read write mode or the reason it can?t.

recoverEligibilityStatusString.description: Localised string representing the basic reason for the read write connect to be enabled/disabled.

readOnlyConnectEligibilityStatus.description: Numeric value representing if the store can be connected to in read only mode or the reason it can?t.

readOnlyConnectEligibilityStatusString.description: Localised string representing the basic reason for read only connect to be enabled/disabled.

recoverDisabledReasonString.description: Localised string indicating why the store is not eligible for read write connect. Blank if the store is eligible.

readOnlyConnectDisabledReason.description: Localised string indicating why the store is not eligible for read only connect. Blank if store is eligible.

cloudStoreId.description: The UID for the cloud store if attached, otherwise not returned.

cspContainer.description: Container name for attached cloud store.

cspAuthenticationId.description: Authentication ID for attached cloud store.

cspAuthenticationVersion.description: AWS Signature Version if a cloud store using Amazon S3 is attached.

attachReadOnlyEnabled.description: True if the store is a cloud store attached in read only mode, false otherwise.

proxyConnectionEnabled.description: True if proxy is to be used for connections to the cloud service provider, false if not

secureConnectionEnabled.description: True if SSL is to used for connections to the cloud service provider, false if not.

cspAuthenticationKey.description: Authentication Key for attached cloud store.

cspContainer.description: Container name for attached cloud store.

cspAuthenticationId.description: Authentication ID for attached cloud store.

cspAuthenticationVersion.description: AWS Signature Version if a cloud store using Amazon S3 is attached.

proxyConnectionEnabled.description: True if proxy is to be used for connections to the cloud service provider, false if not

secureConnectionEnabled.description: True if SSL is to used for connections to the cloud service provider, false if not.

cspAuthenticationKey.description: Authentication Key for attached cloud store.

certificateStartDate.description: The date the certificate used for the cloud store is valid from.

certificateEndDate.description: The date the certificate used for the cloud store is valid until.

sha1Fingerprint.description: The SHA1 fingerprint of the certificate.

sha256Fingerprint.description: The SHA256 fingerprint of the certificate

datajobWrittenBytes.description: The total data size of the datajobs written

datajobReadBytes.description: The total data size of the datajobs read

inboundCopyjobsDataCopiedBytes.description: The total number of bytes copied via inbound copyjobs transferred

outboundCopyjobsDataCopiedBytes.description: The total number of bytes copied via outbound copyjobs transferred

DataAndCopyJobsBytes.description: Model for the Catalyst datajob and copyjob bytes

encryptedKey.description: Store UID, encryption key name and encryption key value encrypted using the supplied password

wanSpeedEnum.description: The bandwidth of the WAN connection, chosen from a list of enum values

wanSpeedCustom.description: The user defined custom bandwidth of the WAN connection, used if custom is chosen for wanSpeedEnum

limitPercentage.description: The percentage of the available WAN bandwidth that should be used

numConcurrentJobs.description: The number of concurrent copy jobs the user expects to run

belowThreshold.description: True if the recommended limit is lower than the threshold limit

generalBandwidthLimitEnabled.description: True if the general bandwidth limit is enabled

generalBandwidthLimit.description: If the limit is enabled, the maximum bandwidth used by the StoreOnce Catalyst outbound copyjobs

currentBandwidthLimit.description: If the limit is enabled, the current bandwidth limit for the StoreOnce Catalyst outbound copyjobs

timeOffset.description: Timezone offset for the window times

primaryWindowEnabled.description: Whether the primary window is enabled

primaryWindowStartTime.description: Start time for the primary bandwidth limit. In system time

primaryWindowEndTime.description: End time for the primary bandwidth limit. In system time

primaryWindowBandwidthLimit.description: Bandwidth limit for the primary window

secondaryWindowEnabled.description: Whether the secondary window is enabled

secondaryWindowStartTime.description: Start time for the secondary bandwidth limit. In system time

secondaryWindowEndTime.description: End time for the secondary bandwidth limit. In system time

secondaryWindowBandwidthLimit.description: Bandwidth limit for the secondary window

blackoutActive.description: Status of blackout. True if blackout active, False if not

blackoutNow.description: Blanket blackout that takes precedence over any blackout windows until further notice

blackoutReasonString.description: Localisable string representing Reason for blackout.

timeOffset.description: Timezone offset for the window times

primaryWindowEnabled.description: Whether the primary window is enabled

primaryWindowStartTime.description: Start time for the primary window. In system time

primaryWindowEndTime.description: End time for the primary window. In system time

secondaryWindowEnabled.description: Whether the secondary window is enabled

secondaryWindowStartTime.description: Start time for the secondary window. In system time

secondaryWindowEndTime.description: End time for the secondary window. In system time

passwordSet.description: Is set to true if the client's password has been set

generalUploadBandwidthLimitEnabled.description: True if the general upload bandwidth limit is enabled

generalUploadBandwidthLimit.description: If the upload limit is enabled, the maximum upload bandwidth used by StoreOnce Catalyst CloudBank

currentUploadBandwidthLimit.description: If the upload limit is enabled, the current upload bandwidth limit for StoreOnce Catalyst CloudBank

generalDownloadBandwidthLimitEnabled.description: True if the general download bandwidth limit is enabled

generalDownloadBandwidthLimit.description: If the download limit is enabled, the maximum download bandwidth used by StoreOnce Catalyst CloudBank

currentDownloadBandwidthLimit.description: If the download is enabled, the current download bandwidth limit for StoreOnce Catalyst CloudBank

identifierAlias.description: The Catalyst over fibre channel identifier alias

filters.description: Catalyst copy job filter settings for the search

orderAscending.description: True if this filter orders the data in ascending date, otherwise descending

count.description: Count of items returned by the search using this filter

waypoint.description: Waypoint to navigate the data returned using this filter

healthLevel.description: The health level of the service

healthLevelString.description: Localised string representing the health level

catStatusString.description: Localised string representing the service status

maxOutboundCopyJobs.description: Maximum concurrent outbound copyjobs that can occur

maxDataAndInboundCopyJobs.description: Maximum concurrent data and inbound copyjobs that can occur

numRemainingStores.description: Number of stores which can be created on this service set

cofcSupported.description: True if Catalyst over fibre channel is supported on this device

numInboundCopyjobSessions.description: Number of active inbound copy jobs on the appliance

numOutboundCopyjobSessions.description: Number of active outbound copy jobs on the appliance

numDataJobSessions.description: Number of active data jobs on the appliance

cloudCapacityBytes.description: Total capacity licensed for cloud storage (in bytes)

cloudDiskBytes.description: The amount of capacity used (post dedupe) in the cloud (in bytes)

cloudFreeBytes.description: The amount of licensed free space in the cloud (in bytes)

cloudUserBytes.description: The amount of data stored in the cloud (in bytes )

variableBlockDedupeSupported.description: True if the store supports variable block dedupe storage mode

fixedBlockDedupeSupported.description: True if the store supports fixed block dedupe storage mode

noDedupeSupported.description: True if the store supports no dedupe storage mode

sparseWriteSupported.description: True if the store supports sparse writes

writeInPlaceSupported.description: True if the store supports write in place

rawReadWriteSupported.description: True if the store supports raw read write

multipleObjectOpenersSupported.description: True if the store supports multiple object openers

multipleObjectWritesSupported.description: True if the store supports multiple object writers

cloneExtentSupported.description: True if the store supports extent cloning

primaryTransferPolicy.description: Primary transfer policy for this store's jobs

primaryTransferPolicyString.description: Localised string representation of the primary transfer policy

secondaryTransferPolicy.description: Secondary transfer policy for this store's jobs

secondaryTransferPolicyString.description: Localised string representation of the secondary transfer policy

sizeOnDiskQuotaEnabled.description: True if quota policy for size on disk is enabled

sizeOnDiskQuotaBytes.description: Size on disk quota limit policy

userDataStoredQuotaEnabled.description: True if quota policy for user data is enabled

dataJobRetentionDays.description: Datajob log retention period in days

copyJobRetentionDays.description: Copyjob log retention period in days

userBytes.description: The total size of the user data that has been stored

diskBytes.description: The actual size of the deduped user data stored on disk

numItems.description: The number of Catalyst items associated with the store

numDataJobs.description: The number of Catalyst datajobs associated with the store

numInboundCopyJobs.description: The number of inbound Catalyst copyjobs associated with the store

numOutboundCopyJobs.description: The number of outbound Catalyst copyjobs associated with the store

healthLevelString.description: Localised representation of the store health

storeStatusString.description: Localised representation of the store status

encryptionEnabled.description: True if the store is encrypted

secureEraseModeString.description: Localised representation of the store erase mode

modifiedDate.description: The date the store was last modified

dedupeStoreId.description: Unique ID for the dedupe store associated with this store

securityModeString.description: The string representation of the stores security mode

dataImmutabilityGraceEnabled.description: True if a grace period for data immutability has been enabled

dataImmutabilityGraceSeconds.description: The minimum amount of time in seconds the backup data is immutable

dataImmutabilityRetentionSeconds.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds the backup data is immutable

dataImmutabilityRetentionEnabled.description: True if a retention period for data immutability has been enabled

sslCertificate.description: SSL certificate details to use for the relevant cloud provider.

cloudStoreEnabled.description: Flag telling whether it's a cloud store

cloudStoreDetails.description: Details of the attached cloud store

clientIpAddress.description: The IP address of the client that created this copyjob

clientId.description: A string representing the client that created this copyjob

applicationId.description: String representing the application that was used to create this copyjob

queuedDate.description: The date that the source object was queued to be copied

startedDate.description: The date that the source object last started to copy

endedDate.description: The date that the source object stopped copying

jobStatus.description: The status of the completed copyjob

jobStatusString.description: Localised string representing the status of the completed copyjob

jobStatusCode.description: A numeric value for the status of the copy job. Provides further info for the status of the job.

lastPauseCancelReason.description: The most recent reason the copyjob was paused or cancelled

lastPauseCancelReasonString.description: Localised string representing the most recent reason the copyjob was paused or cancelled

lastFailedRunReason.description: The most recent reason why the copyjob failed to run

lastFailedRunReasonString.description: Localised string representing the most recent reason why the copyjob failed to run

jobStatusInfo.description: The most recent reason why the copyjob failed to run or was paused or cancelled

jobStatusInfoString.description: Localised string representing the most recent reason why the copyjob failed to run or was paused or cancelled

failedAttempts.description: Number of times the copyjob has been attempted but failed to complete

lastAttemptDate.description: The date that the copyjob was last attempted

nextAttemptDate.description: The date that the copyjob will next be attempted

markedForCancellation.description: True if the copyjob has been marked to be cancelled

cancellable.description: True if this copyjob is able to be cancelled

dataCopiedBytes.description: The size of the data that has been copied so far

percentageComplete.description: The percentage of the copy complete so far

estimatedCompletionDate.description: The estimated date that the copyjob will complete

jobDurationSeconds.description: The duration that the copyjob ran for, excluding queued/paused time

writtenDiskBytes.description: The size of the data written for this data job

writeDedupeRatio.description: The dedupe ratio of the write data

copyDataTransmittedBytes.description: The size of the read data transferred for this data job

copyNetworkThroughput.description: The bandwidth utilization of this copyjob

percentageCopyBandwidthSaving.description: The bandwidth saving of the copy data

copyLogicalThroughput.description: The copy throughput (in bytes/sec) of this copyjob

transportProtocol.description: The transport protocol of the job

transportProtocolString.description: Localised representation of the transport protocol of the job

destinationClientSecurityMode.description: A numeric value for the security mode of the destination client.

destinationClientSecurityModeString.description: String representation of the security mode of the destination client.

originClientSecurityMode.description: A numeric value for the security mode of the origin client.

originClientSecurityModeString.description: String representation of the security mode of the origin client.

origin.description: Information about the origin of the job

destination.description: Information about the destination of the job

id.description: Unique ID for the copyjob at the destination

address.description: The IP Address or FQDN of the destination appliance

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the destination appliance

commandPort.description: The command port for the destination appliance

dataPort.description: The data port for the destination appliance

storeName.description: The name of the destination store

itemName.description: The name of the destination item

userBytes.description: The size of the target item when it was last flushed

copyOffsetBytes.description: The offset within the target item from which to start the copy

id.description: Unique ID for the copyjob at the origin

address.description: The IP Address or FQDN of the source appliance

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the source appliance

storeName.description: The name of the source store

itemName.description: The name of the source item

userBytes.description: The size of the source item

dataModifiedDate.description: The date that the source object was last modified

copySizeBytes.description: The size of the data to be copied

copyOffsetBytes.description: The offset within the source item from which to start the copy

fixedBlockSizeBytes.description: The size of the fixed block dedupe

storageModeString.description: Localised representation of the storage mode

name.description: The name of the Catalyst item being accessed

jobStatusString.description: Localised representation of the basic status of the datajob

jobStatusInfo.description: Further status information associated with this datajob

jobStatusInfoString.description: Localised string representation of the further status information associated with this datajob

jobStatusCode.description: The status code of the completed datajob. Provides a more detailed reason why the job has failed

jobDurationSeconds.description: The duration of the data session

writtenUserBytes.description: The size of the data written for this datajob

writtenDiskBytes.description: The size of the data written to disk for this datajob

writeDurationSeconds.description: The duration of the write operation for this datajob

writeLogicalThroughput.description: The write logical throughput (in bytes/sec) of this datajob

writeTransferredBytes.description: The size of the write data transferred for this datajob

writeNetworkThroughput.description: The write bandwidth utilization of this datajob in (in bytes/sec)

percentageWriteBandwidthSaving.description: The bandwidth saving of the write data

writeDedupeRatio.description: The dedupe ratio of the write data

readUserBytes.description: The data read for this datajob

readDiskBytes.description: The size of the data read from disk for this datajob
